name: motion-detector
description: Motion Detector - Monorepo with React frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.setup: npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.setup:backend: cd apps/api && python -m venv venv && (source venv/bin/activate || venv\Scripts\activate) && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev:api: cd apps/api && (source venv/bin/activate || venv\Scripts\activate) && uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.test:backend: cd apps/api && (source venv/bin/activate || venv\Scripts\activate) && python -m pytest tests/ -v
scripts.test:coverage:backend: cd apps/api && (source venv/bin/activate || venv\Scripts\activate) && pip install pytest-cov && python -m pytest tests/ --cov=. --cov-report=term --cov-report=html
scripts.lint:backend: cd apps/api && (source venv/bin/activate || venv\Scripts\activate) && pip install black isort flake8 && black --check . && isort --check-only . && flake8 .
scripts.format:backend: cd apps/api && (source venv/bin/activate || venv\Scripts\activate) && pip install black isort && black . && isort .
scripts.security:scan: npm run security:scan:backend && npm run security:scan:npm
scripts.security:scan:backend: cd apps/api && (source venv/bin/activate || venv\Scripts\activate) && pip install safety bandit && safety check && bandit -r . -x tests/,venv/
scripts.ci:check: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run security:scan && npm run build
scripts.ci:full: npm run ci:check && npm run docker:build
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
